page.title: 13 Life Styles
page.content: We wanted to know more information about our area so we went and interviewed Mrs Briley the landlord's wife at the Angel pub.In the morning Mr and Mrs Briley read the morning papers, they don't have breakfast they just get on with the work.The morning session is from 11.00 a.m.until 2.30 p.m.From 12.00 Mrs Briley does snacks and meals for the bar.Then at 4.00 _ 5.30 p.m.they have their main meal of the day.Then Mr Briley does some cellar work and gets the bar ready for the evening session which is 7.00 _ 11.00 p.m.but it is usually about 11.30 p.m. before they can get the customers to leave the pub.Then they do the cashing out of the till and have supper.Mr and Mrs Briley usually go to bed around 12.00 midnight or 1.00 a.m..
